root: ^Agent, I am the coordinator of this operation, are you ready to hear the briefing, do you copy?
^This is an agent, that's right, go ahead.
^Our research drones have detected a powerful electromagnetic burst in the area.
^In the images we were able to obtain, we could only see an unusual red glow.
^You are tasked with going to the research area and finding the source.
^The code name for your mission is "Red Heat".
^Oh my head, why am i bleeding?
^What? Why the hell did the engines stall?
